languages.text: {n}Арджента отпускает голову.{/n} "Люди Теодоры приняли сигнал бедствия, прилетели и забрали меня на корабль. Я едва помню произошедшее — когда они прибыли, я уже была тяжело ранена, отбивалась из последних сил. Кажется, я кричала, что мы должны пойти в наступление... но меня не послушали. Забрали на шаттл и отступили. Потом — чернота... а потом я пришла в себя уже во время варп-прыжка. Теодора торопилась по другим делам и считала, что может очистить планету позже".

traits.locale_text: {n}Арджента отпускает голову.{/n} "Люди Теодоры приняли сигнал бедствия, прилетели и забрали меня на корабль. Я едва помню произошедшее — когда они прибыли, я уже была тяжело ранена, отбивалась из последних сил. Кажется, я кричала, что мы должны пойти в наступление... но меня не послушали. Забрали на шаттл и отступили. Потом — чернота... а потом я пришла в себя уже во время варп-прыжка. Теодора торопилась по другим делам и считала, что может очистить планету позже".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta hangs her head.{/n} "Theodora's people received the distress call, came to my rescue, and brought me aboard the ship. I barely remember what happened — when they arrived, I was already severely wounded, fighting back with whatever remained of my strength. I think I shouted that we had to go after them... but they didn't listen. They took me to the shuttle and pulled out. After that, it's all blackness... When I came to, we were already in the middle of a warp jump. Theodora had urgent matters to take care of, and she decided that she could clear out the planet at a later time."
languages.original_text: {n}Арджента отпускает голову.{/n} "Люди Теодоры приняли сигнал бедствия, прилетели и забрали меня на корабль. Я едва помню произошедшее — когда они прибыли, я уже была тяжело ранена, отбивалась из последних сил. Кажется, я кричала, что мы должны пойти в наступление... но меня не послушали. Забрали на шаттл и отступили. Потом — чернота... а потом я пришла в себя уже во время варп-прыжка. Теодора торопилась по другим делам и считала, что может очистить планету позже".

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta hangs her head.{/n} "Theodora's people received the distress call, came to my rescue, and brought me aboard the ship. I barely remember what happened — when they arrived, I was already severely wounded, fighting back with whatever remained of my strength. I think I was shouting that we had to go after them... but they didn't listen. They took me to the shuttle and pulled out. After that it's all blackness... when I came to, we were already in the middle of a warp jump. Theodora had urgent matters to take care of, and she decided that she could purge the planet at a later time."

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔低下了头。{/n}“西奥多拉的人收到了求救信号，他们赶来救了我，把我带上了船。我已经不记得当时发生了什么事情。他们赶来的时候，我已经受了重伤，正用仅存的力量拼死反抗。我还记得，我当时放声大喊要追杀那群异端分子……但他们并没有听。他们把我带到了穿梭机上，之后就离开了。在那之后，只剩下一片漆黑……当我醒过来的时候，我们已经在进行亚空间跳跃了。西奥多拉有更紧急的事情要处理，她打算等以后有空的时候再来清理这颗行星。”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta hangs her head.{/n} "Theodora's people received the distress call, came to my rescue, and brought me aboard the ship. I barely remember what happened — when they arrived, I was already severely wounded, fighting back with whatever remained of my strength. I think I shouted that we had to go after them... but they didn't listen. They took me to the shuttle and pulled out. After that, it's all blackness... When I came to, we were already in the middle of a warp jump. Theodora had urgent matters to take care of, and she decided that she could clear out the planet at a later time."

traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta agacha la cabeza.{/n} «La gente de Theodora recibió mi llamada de socorro y acudió en mi ayuda, trayéndome a bordo de la nave. Apenas recuerdo lo que sucedió. Para cuando llegaron, estaba gravemente herida y luchando con las pocas fuerzas que me quedaban. Creo que grité que teníamos que seguirles... pero no me hicieron caso. Me arrastraron a la lanzadera y se marcharon. Después, solo recuerdo oscuridad... Cuando recuperé el conocimiento, estábamos en un salto de disformidad. Theodora tenía asuntos urgentes que atender y decidió que la purga del planeta podía esperar».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta hangs her head.{/n} "Theodora's people received the distress call, came to my rescue, and brought me aboard the ship. I barely remember what happened — when they arrived, I was already severely wounded, fighting back with whatever remained of my strength. I think I shouted that we had to go after them... but they didn't listen. They took me to the shuttle and pulled out. After that, it's all blackness... When I came to, we were already in the middle of a warp jump. Theodora had urgent matters to take care of, and she decided that she could clear out the planet at a later time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta agacha la cabeza.{/n} «La gente de Theodora recibió mi llamada de socorro y acudió en mi ayuda, trayéndome a bordo de la nave. Apenas recuerdo lo que sucedió. Para cuando llegaron, estaba gravemente herida y luchando con las pocas fuerzas que me quedaban. Creo que grité que teníamos que seguirles... pero no me hicieron caso. Me arrastraron a la lanzadera y se marcharon. Después, solo recuerdo oscuridad... Cuando recuperé el conocimiento, estábamos en un salto de disformidad. Theodora tenía asuntos urgentes que atender y decidió que la purga del planeta podía esperar».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタは頭を垂れる。{/n}「シオドーラの仲間が救難信号を受信し、我を助けに来て、船に乗せてくれたのです。彼らが到着したとき、我はすでに重傷を負っており、残っている力を振り絞って抵抗していたところでした。我は奴らを追いかけなければならないと叫んだ…と思う。だが、彼らは聞く耳を持たなかった。彼らは我をシャトルまで連れて行き、引き上げたんだ。その後は眼の前が真っ暗になって…気がつくと、すでにワープジャンプの真っ最中だった。シオドーラには緊急の用事があり、この惑星の撤収は後日と決めたのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta hangs her head.{/n} "Theodora's people received the distress call, came to my rescue, and brought me aboard the ship. I barely remember what happened — when they arrived, I was already severely wounded, fighting back with whatever remained of my strength. I think I shouted that we had to go after them... but they didn't listen. They took me to the shuttle and pulled out. After that, it's all blackness... When I came to, we were already in the middle of a warp jump. Theodora had urgent matters to take care of, and she decided that she could clear out the planet at a later time."

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタは頭を垂れる。{/n}「シオドーラの仲間が救難信号を受信し、我を助けに来て、船に乗せてくれたのです。彼らが到着したとき、我はすでに重傷を負っており、残っている力を振り絞って抵抗していたところでした。我は奴らを追いかけなければならないと叫んだ…と思う。だが、彼らは聞く耳を持たなかった。彼らは我をシャトルまで連れて行き、引き上げたんだ。その後は眼の前が真っ暗になって…気がつくと、すでにワープジャンプの真っ最中だった。シオドーラには緊急の用事があり、この惑星の撤収は後日と決めたのだ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta lässt den Kopf hängen.{/n} "Theodoras Leute empfingen mein Notsignal, retteten mich und brachten mich an Bord des Schiffs. Ich kann mich kaum noch an etwas erinnern – als sie eintrafen, war ich bereits schwer verwundet und kämpfte mit dem letzten Rest meiner Kraft. Ich glaube, ich habe gebrüllt, wir müssten sie verfolgen ... aber niemand hörte darauf. Sie brachten mich ins Shuttle und zogen ab. Danach wurde alles schwarz ... Als ich wieder zu mir kam, waren wir schon mitten in einem Warpsprung. Theodora hatte wichtige Angelegenheiten zu erledigen und entschied, sie könne sich den Planeten auch später noch ansehen."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta hangs her head.{/n} "Theodora's people received the distress call, came to my rescue, and brought me aboard the ship. I barely remember what happened — when they arrived, I was already severely wounded, fighting back with whatever remained of my strength. I think I shouted that we had to go after them... but they didn't listen. They took me to the shuttle and pulled out. After that, it's all blackness... When I came to, we were already in the middle of a warp jump. Theodora had urgent matters to take care of, and she decided that she could clear out the planet at a later time."

Ich kann mich kaum noch an etwas erinnern – als sie eintrafen, war ich bereits schwer verwundet und kämpfte mit dem letzten Rest meiner Kraft. Ich glaube, ich habe gebrüllt, wir müssten sie verfolgen ... aber niemand hörte darauf. Sie brachten mich ins Shuttle und zogen ab. Danach wurde alles schwarz ... Als ich wieder zu mir kam, waren wir schon mitten in einem Warpsprung. Theodora hatte wichtige Angelegenheiten zu erledigen und entschied, sie könne sich den Planeten auch später noch ansehen."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta baisse la tête.{/n} « Les membres d'équipage de Théodora ont reçu notre appel de détresse. Ils sont venus à mon secours et m'ont ramenée à bord. Mes souvenirs des événements sont flous. À leur arrivée, j'étais déjà gravement blessée et je continuais à me battre avec le peu de forces qu'il me restait. Je crois avoir crié qu'il fallait poursuivre les cultistes... mais au lieu de ça, ils m'ont emmenée à la navette et se sont repliés. Ensuite, j'ai perdu connaissance... Quand je suis revenue à moi, nous étions déjà en plein saut Warp. Théodora avait décidé qu'elle pourrait revenir chasser ces hérétiques ultérieurement, après avoir réglé des affaires plus urgentes. »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta hangs her head.{/n} "Theodora's people received the distress call, came to my rescue, and brought me aboard the ship. I barely remember what happened — when they arrived, I was already severely wounded, fighting back with whatever remained of my strength. I think I shouted that we had to go after them... but they didn't listen. They took me to the shuttle and pulled out. After that, it's all blackness... When I came to, we were already in the middle of a warp jump. Theodora had urgent matters to take care of, and she decided that she could clear out the planet at a later time."

Mes souvenirs des événements sont flous. À leur arrivée, j'étais déjà gravement blessée et je continuais à me battre avec le peu de forces qu'il me restait. Je crois avoir crié qu'il fallait poursuivre les cultistes... mais au lieu de ça, ils m'ont emmenée à la navette et se sont repliés. Ensuite, j'ai perdu connaissance... Quand je suis revenue à moi, nous étions déjà en plein saut Warp. Théodora avait décidé qu'elle pourrait revenir chasser ces hérétiques ultérieurement, après avoir réglé des affaires plus urgentes. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta başını eğiyor.{/n} "Theodora'nın mürettebatı, yardım çağrısını aldıktan sonra desteğe gelip beni gemiye götürdü. Ne olduğunu hayal meyal hatırlıyorum. Yardımıma yetiştiklerinde ağır yaralanmış durumdaydım. Kalan gücümle direnmeye devam ediyordum. Peşlerine düşmemiz gerektiğini söyledim sanırım... Bağırmış olabilirim. Ancak kulak asmadılar. Beni mekiğe götürüp gezegenden ayrıldılar. Sonrası karanlık... Kendime geldiğimde öte sıçrama ortasındaydık. Theodora'nın ilgilenmesi gereken önemli meseleler vardı, bu yüzden gezegeni daha sonra arındırmaya karar verdi."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta hangs her head.{/n} "Theodora's people received the distress call, came to my rescue, and brought me aboard the ship. I barely remember what happened — when they arrived, I was already severely wounded, fighting back with whatever remained of my strength. I think I shouted that we had to go after them... but they didn't listen. They took me to the shuttle and pulled out. After that, it's all blackness... When I came to, we were already in the middle of a warp jump. Theodora had urgent matters to take care of, and she decided that she could clear out the planet at a later time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta başını eğiyor.{/n} "Theodora'nın mürettebatı, yardım çağrısını aldıktan sonra desteğe geldiler ve beni gemiye götürdüler. Ne olduğunu hayal meyal hatırlıyorum. Destek geldiğinde ağır yaralanmış durumdaydım. Kalan gücümle direnmeye devam ediyordum. Peşlerine düşmemiz gerektiğini söyledim sanırım… Bağırmış olabilirim. Ancak kulak asmadılar. Beni mekiğe götürüp gezegenden ayrıldılar. Sonrası karanlık… Kendime geldiğimde öte sıçramanın ortasındaydık. Theodora'nın ilgilenmesi gereken önemli meseleler vardı, bu yüzden gezegeni daha sonra arındırmaya karar verdi.
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
